values.title: Rascal Flatts
values.desc: Ive been burdened with blame trapped in the past for too long Im moving on

values.title: Jonny Lang
values.desc: I truly loved you but now Im walking away

values.title: Boyz II Men
values.desc: time made me stronger youre no longer on my mind

values.title: Kimberly Novosel Loved
values.desc: I threw his framed picture off my balcony just to hear my heart break

values.title: Greta Garbo
values.desc: Im a completely worthless woman and no man should risk his life for me

values.title: Kimberly Novosel
values.desc: I decided I would fill the emptiness in me with God and with paint

values.title: Rachel Hawthorne A Year In Europe
values.desc: you mourn you hurt and you start to heal

values.title: Gerard Way
values.desc: It is not a band It is an idea

values.title: Lindsey Kelk I Heart New York
values.desc: A break up is the closest thing to bereavement

values.title: Damon Suede Hot Head
values.desc: If your heart is broken do you have a phantom heart

values.title: Charlotte Eriksson
values.desc: You were the hardest year of my life and Ive never been so happy What does that say about me
